comment: What kind of flavor profile are you going for here? I see you have some chocolate malt, is that sole for color? with all that munich and vienna your going to get a malty beer despite the 101 IBU's. why the Pilsner malt? why cane sugar and not dextrose?

Ya I used too much Vienna once and it may have been the source in witch I got it from but it came out bad. Never used it again. Some of my best beer was made with leftover grains and hops thrown on a huge yeast cake.
